did.unittitle: Lectures on "Explanation and Proof". 1st recorded lecture, 3rd of the series; 1st part. "Pathological" character of skeptical-idealistic metaphysics. 1st reel 1957 Feb 19
Continuation of "Explanation and Proof"; 1st recorded lecture, 3rd of the series; 2nd part. Questions not amenable to definite procedure. 2nd reel 1957 Feb 19
